org.roolie
Class RuleArgs

java.lang.Object
  org.roolie.RuleArgs

public class RuleArgs
extends java.lang.Object

Arguments passed to rules to evaluate.

You will likely subclass this class and wrap getters and setters around the properties your rules care about.
